attributes.action: Put speed camera or speed bumps in on London Road,Kirton
attributes.additional_details: This need to happen before someone gets seriously injured or killed, it shouldn’t wait for someone’s life to be destroyed for action to be taken! It shouldn’t even come down to cost it should come down to peoples lives and the safety of others !
attributes.background: We currently have a speed restriction of 30mph on this road. But it’s very rare that people actually do 30mph, we need some serious action taken!, maybe some speed calming measures ie speed camera or speed bumps to prevent this!.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.
